ActivityMetadata.Name: GH Update Git LFS preference
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH Update Git LFS preference
ActivityMetadata.Description: You can import repositories from Subversion, Mercurial, and TFS that include files larger than 100MB. This ability is powered by [Git LFS](https://git-lfs.github.com). You can learn more about our LFS feature and working with large files [on our help site](https://help.github.com/articles/versioning-large-files/).
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

Update Git LFS preference

You can import repositories from Subversion, Mercurial, and TFS that include files larger than 100MB. This ability is powered by [Git LFS](https://git-lfs.github.com). You can learn more about our LFS feature and working with large files [on our help site](https://help.github.com/articles/versioning-large-files/).

Method: Patch

OperationID: migrations/set-lfs-preference

EndPoint:

/repos/{owner}/{repo}/import/lfs
